meanings.definition: The act of becoming material or tangible.
meanings.sent1: The materializations of his dreams were finally within reach.
meanings.sent2: The materializations of the artist's imagination were on display at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The materializations of the magician's tricks left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The materializations of her hard work were evident in the successful project.
meanings.sent5: The materializations of the plan were so clear, it felt like touching them.

meanings.definition: The process of bringing something into physical existence.
meanings.sent1: The materializations of new ideas require dedication and effort.
meanings.sent2: The materializations of the architect's design were impressive.
meanings.sent3: The materializations of the recipe turned out better than expected.
meanings.sent4: The materializations of the plan were like watching a seed grow into a tree.
meanings.sent5: The materializations of the project were so real, you could almost hold them.

meanings.definition: The manifestation or appearance of something in a physical form.
meanings.sent1: The materializations of the ghostly figure startled the guests.
meanings.sent2: The materializations of the character on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The materializations of the painting seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent4: The materializations of the concept were like seeing a thought take shape.
meanings.sent5: The materializations of the sculpture were so lifelike, it was hard to believe they were not real.
